channel.title: transcription regulator on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in transcription regulator on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaHD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaHD8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identify a homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-ZIP) IV transcription factor, AaHD8, directly promoting the expression of AaHD1 for glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaMYC2 Gene Name: MYC2 transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-responsive AaMYC2 transcription factor positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Aannua01956S266050 Gene Symbol: AaWRKY17 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaWRKY17, a positive regulator of artemisinin biosynthesis, is involved in resistance to Pseudomonas syringae in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaYABBY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaYABBY5 Gene Name: YABBY family transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis in Artemisia annua by AaYABBY5.

item.title: AcNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: A dramatic decline in fruit citrate induced by mutagenesis of a NAC transcription factor, AcNAC1.

item.title: AcNAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc08288 Gene Symbol: AcNAC4 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcNAC4 regulates the transcription of AcAAT10 by binding to and activating its promoter.

item.title: BjCdR15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjCdR15 Gene Name: BZIP transcription factor15 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: The Brassica juncea BjCdR15, an ortholog of Arabidopsis TGA3, is a regulator of cadmium uptake, transport and accumulation in shoots and confers cadmium tolerance in transgenic plants.

item.title: bZIP68;ABI5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb176680 Gene Symbol: bZIP68 ABI5 ZmABF3 ZmbZIP33 Gene Name: bZIP-transcription factor 68 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaASR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaASR1 promotes salicylic acid- but represses jasmonic acid-dependent signaling to enhance the resistance of Capsicum annuum to bacterial wilt by modulating CabZIP63.

item.title: CaHDZ15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHDZ15 Gene Name: HD-Zip I TF 15 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CaHDZ15 promotes pepper basal thermotolerance by activating HEAT SHOCK FACTORA6a.

item.title: ClERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClERF4 Gene Name: ethylene-responsive transcription factor 4 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClERF4 in regulating watermelon rind hardness and implied that ethylene is a common regulator of fruit firmness in both climacteric and nonclimacteric fruits.

item.title: CmBBX8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBBX8 Gene Name: the subgroup II B-box 8 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmBES1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBES1 Gene Name: BRI1-EMS-SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmBPE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DN58070_c2_g1 Gene Symbol: CmBPE2 Gene Name: Chrysanthemum morifolium BIGPETAL2 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmHY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHY5 Gene Name: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL5 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmHY5 functions in apigenin biosynthesis by regulating flavone synthase II expression in chrysanthemum flowers.

item.title: CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CMiso1.1chr10g0266651 Gene Symbol: CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Melon (Charmono) v1.

item.title: CrWRKY42
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY42 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 42 Genome: Species: Citrus clementina Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CrWRKY42 coregulates chlorophyll degradation and carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CSA
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g16810 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0274800 Gene Symbol: CSA Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsAGL16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G048150 Gene Symbol: CsAGL16 Gene Name: AGAMOUS-LIKE 16 Genome: Cucurbitaceae genome database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The AGAMOUS-LIKE 16–GENERAL REGULATORY FACTOR 1 module regulates axillary bud outgrowth via catabolism of abscisic acid in cucumber.

item.title: CsbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g25230 Gene Symbol: CsbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP44 is essential for ABA-mediated carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsJAZ6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsJAZ6 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis JASMONATE-ZIM DOMAIN6 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsMADS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMADS5 Gene Name: FRUITFULL sub-clade MADS 5 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A fruit ripening-associated transcription factor CsMADS5 positively regulates carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsS40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0010485.1 Gene Symbol: CsS40 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Senescnece 40 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CsS40 negatively regulates TCS1 expression and caffeine biosynthesis in connection to leaf senescence in Camellia sinensis.

item.title: CsULT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsULT1 Gene Name: ultrapetala transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Identification, cloning and characterization of an ultrapetala transcription factor CsULT1 from Crocus: a novel regulator of apocarotenoid biosynthesis.

item.title: DcHB30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Dca25151 Gene Symbol: DcHB30 Gene Name: homeobox30 Genome: Carnation Genome database (http://carnation.

item.title: DcWRKY75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Dca5929 Gene Symbol: DcWRKY75 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor75 Genome: Carnation Genome database (http://carnation.

item.title: DkMyb2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor2 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb2 wound-induced transcription factor of persimmon (Diospyros kaki Thunb.

item.title: DkMyb4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb4 Gene Name: Myb transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb4 Is a Myb Transcription Factor Involved in Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: FaRIF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g20700 Gene Symbol: FaRIF|FaNAC035 Gene Name: Ripening Inducing Factor Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor FaRIF|FaNAC035 controls fruit ripening in strawberry.

item.title: FcWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FcWRKY40 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 40 Genome: Species: Citrus japonic Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor FcWRKY40 of Fortunella crassifolia functions positively in salt tolerance through modulation of ion homeostasis and proline biosynthesis by directly regulating SOS2 and P5CS1 homologs.

item.title: FveMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22020 Gene Symbol: FveMYB10 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB transcription factor FveMYB10 is a major regulator of anthocyanin pigmentation in the red fruits of strawberry.

item.title: FvMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_7g15060 Gene Symbol: FvMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Fragaria vesca ID (v4.

item.title: FvRIF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g20700 Gene Symbol: FvRIF Gene Name: Ripening Inducing Factor Genome: Fragaria vesca Whole Genome v4.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: GhERF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF6 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhFSN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A12G1049 Gene Symbol: GhFSN1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.007G350500.1 Gene Symbol: GhMYB212 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 212 Genome: Phytozome v.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhSOC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSOC1 Gene Name: Genome: cotton reference genome v2.

item.title: GmABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10g071700 Gene Symbol: GmABF3 Gene Name: abscisic acid-responsive element-binding factor 3 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmCAL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gm.02G121600 Gene Symbol: GmCAL Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmCAL-silencing plants still conferred resistance to SC8 that might be owing to incomplete silencing of genes with lower expression.

item.title: GmCAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14G223500 Gene Symbol: GmCAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Upon binding to GmDPB, PsAvh113 decreased the transcription of the downstream gene GmCAT1, which acts as a positive regulator of plant immunity.

item.title: GmDPB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01G228100 Gene Symbol: GmDPB Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Upon binding to GmDPB, PsAvh113 decreased the transcription of the downstream gene GmCAT1, which acts as a positive regulator of plant immunity.

item.title: GmST05
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SoyZH13_05G229200 Gene Symbol: GmST05 Gene Name: Seed Thickness on Chromosome 5 Genome: [Zhonghuang 13 (ZH13) reference genome](https://phytozome-next.

item.title: GmSW16.1;SW16.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmSW16.1 SW16.1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Differential SW16.

item.title: GmZF392
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G205700 Gene Symbol: GmZF392 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmZF392, a tandem CCCH zinc finger (TZF) protein which was identified in our previous RNA-seq analysis of seed-preferred transcription factors, was found to function as a positive regulator of lipid production.

item.title: GWHTACFB001163
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsWRKY13 Gene Symbol: GWHTACFB001163 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWRKY13 acts as a negative regulator of lignin biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: HvNAC005
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvNAC005 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Barley plants over-expressing the NAC transcription factor gene HvNAC005 show stunting and delay in development combined with early senescence.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: ID1;ZmIDD5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb047750 Gene Symbol: ID1 ZmIDD5 Gene Name: indeterminate growth1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: JrVHAG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrVHAG1 Gene Name: vacuolar H+-ATPase G 1 Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrVHAG1 is involved in plant abiotic strss response.

item.title: LjERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjERF1 Gene Name: transcription factor AP2-EREBP Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: A Positive Regulatory Role for LjERF1 in the Nodulation Process Is Revealed by Systematic Analysis of Nodule-Associated Transcription Factors of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LuWRKY36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lus10026409 Gene Symbol: LuWRKY36 Gene Name: Genome: Linum usitatissimum genome v1.

item.title: MaICE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaICE1 Gene Name: transcription factor ICE1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Banana fruit NAC transcription factor MaNAC1 is a direct target of MaICE1 and involved in cold stress through interacting with MaCBF1.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdBT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000643281 Gene Symbol: MdBT2 Gene Name: BROAD-COMPLEX, TRAMTRACK AND BRIC A BRAC2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: MdBT2 is a BTB protein that directly interacts with and stabilizes MdCOP1 by inhibiting self-ubiquitination.

item.title: MdKCS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1087400 Gene Symbol: MdKCS1 Gene Name: Malus domestica β-KETOACYL-COA SYNTHASE 1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000237742 Gene Symbol: MdMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Ethylene enhances MdMAPK3-mediated phosphorylation of MdNAC72 to promote apple fruit softening.

item.title: MdMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000259614 Gene Symbol: MdMYB1 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYB1–1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB1–1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The effect of promoter methylation on MdMYB1 expression determines the level of anthocyanin accumulation in skins of two non-red apple cultivars.

item.title: MdMYB1–2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB1–2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The effect of promoter methylation on MdMYB1 expression determines the level of anthocyanin accumulation in skins of two non-red apple cultivars.

item.title: MdMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Efficient induction of anthocyanin biosynthesis in transient assays by MdMYB10 was dependent on the co-expression of two distinct bHLH proteins from apple, MdbHLH3 and MdbHLH33.

item.title: MdPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1189400 Gene Symbol: MdPHR1 Gene Name: PHOSPHATE STARVATION RESPONSE1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: determined that MdPHR1 was essential for Pi deficiency-induced anthocyanin accumulation in apple (Malus × domestica).

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1189400 Gene Symbol: MdPHR1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdTCP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD13G1073500 Gene Symbol: MdTCP15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Histone deacetylase MdHDA6 is an antagonist in regulation of transcription factor MdTCP15 to promote cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdWRKY75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000123888 Gene Symbol: MdWRKY75 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 75 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdWRKY9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdWRKY9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The Ca2+-MdCRF4-MdWRKY9 module negatively affects apple fruit watercore formation by suppressing the transcription of MdSOT2.

item.title: PacCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PaMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PaMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcriptional regulator 10 Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB transcription factor PaMYB10 is involved in anthocyanin biosynthesis in apricots and determines red blushed skin.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster_9455 Gene Symbol: PsMYB30 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor30 Genome: Species: Paeonia suffruticosa Functional Descriptions: Tree Peony R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor PsMYB30 Promotes Petal Blotch Formation by Activating the Transcription of the Anthocyanin Synthase Gene.

item.title: PtRD26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.001G404100 Gene Symbol: PtRD26 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: An alternative splicing variant of PtRD26 delays leaf senescence by regulating multiple NAC transcription factors in Populus.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RLL3 Gene Name: Red Lettuce Leaves 3 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The characterization of multiple polymorphic genes in this study provides the necessary molecular resources for the rational breeding of lettuce cultivars with distinct levels of red pigments and green cultivars with high levels of health-promoting flavonoids.

item.title: SlAN11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAN11 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA GLABRA 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlAN11 regulates flavonoid biosynthesis and seed dormancy by interaction with bHLH proteins but not with MYB proteins.
